HiGlass

Description

HiGlass is a tool for exploring genomic contact matrices and tracks. It can be configured to explore and compare contact matrices across multiple scales.

Funding

  • 4D Nucleome Network Data Coordination and Integration Center (NIH U01CA200059)
    National Institutes of Health - Common Fund

Team

  • Peter Kerpedjiev
  • Chuck McCallum
